text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Tryouts—where Umamusume of all<n>backgrounds meet their
destined<n>trainers.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I stop by a nearby shrine to make a<n>quick wish in hopes of
meeting the<n>absolute best Umamusume.

Whoaaaaa! Do my eyes deceive me,<n>or is that shining
emblem what I think<n>it is?!

So the fated day has finally arrived!<n>My trainer has
appeared before me!
choice_data_list: If it's money you're after, I don't have any.

text_block_list.text:
Waaah?! Just who do you think I<n>am?! I'm an upstanding<n>
Umamusume! I'd never do something<n>so nefarious!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Oh, right. I haven't introduced myself.<n>Sorry about that! Call
me<n>Matikanefukukitaru!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: I've been waitin' and waitin' forthe One to show up. Finally! Allthat waiting has paid off!
choice_data_list: The One? What are you talking about?
The One? What are you talking about?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: I'm talking about none other than<n>you, of course!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
A mere few hours ago, the great<n>Shiraoki revealed to me
that I must<n>come to this shrine and try my luck by<n>drawing
a fortune.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
And surprise, surprise—it said I would<n>"meet the One" at this
very spot!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: That's when you showed up, just<n>like it said you would!
choice_data_list: I think you've got the wrong person.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
H-hooold on, don't you move! I've<n>got the right person—I
know it!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Just think about it for a moment! I'm<n>an Umamusume, and
you're a trainer!<n>Isn't this too perfect to just be some<n>
kind of coincidence?!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Our meeting was fated—predestined to<n>happen and divined
by the great<n>Shiraoki herself!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Tis not the time to dawdle! We must<n>rise to the challenge
and seize our<n>future by running in the Twinkle<n>Series—you
and me, together!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's really going to make me her<n>trainer if I don't say
anything.
choice_data_list:
Sorry, but I can't be your trainer without getting
to know you first.

Sorry, but I can't be your trainer without getting
to know you first.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Fair enough. That checks out!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Got it! In that case, please hear me<n>out! There's this event
where I can<n>show you who I really am!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
At the upcoming tryouts, I'll prove to<n>you my worth as a
runner!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I'll make you regret that you didn't<n>scout me right here and
now, just you<n>wait and see!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
And when you eventually change<n>your mind, that's when
we'll start<n>training! But for now, I've gotta hit it!<n>Great
fortune await me!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With that final exclamation, the young<n>girl by the name of<n>
Matikanefukukitaru dashed off into<n>the horizon.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The next day, I make my way to the<n>racetrack and see all
the hopeful<n>Umamusume deeply focused on<n>training for
the upcoming tryouts.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Let's give this our best shot! Got it,<n>Suzuka?!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Ummm... Why did you bring me here?<n>What are we doing at
the racetrack?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Today's carrot divination said that I'd<n>be lucky during
partner running<n>practice! So you gotta practice with<n>me!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Well... If that's all you're asking for, I<n>suppose it wouldn't
hurt to help...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
That's the spirit! Thanks a bunch! I'll<n>give you a little charm
later as a gift! It<n>makes you separate all your<n>disposable
chopsticks perfectly down<n>the middle!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
All righty then... Since today's lucky<n>number is 39, let's do
thirty-nine laps<n>around the course!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
What?! You do realize that one lap is<n>two kilometers, right?
Thirty-nine laps<n>would be over sixty kilometers...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Not a problem! The lucky number<n>never lies!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: H-hey! We aren't really doing this,<n>are we?!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... Dang it... Maybethirty-nine was too much...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Pant... pant... I told you so... Andrunning at full speed from the verystart definitely didn't help...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
But we ran this far precisely because<n>we set such a high
bar! It's all thanks<n>to today's lucky number!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: We only ran four laps though...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Okay, let's move on now! The carrots<n>told me that
swimming is the best<n>training to do next, so to the pool we<n>
go!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Today's lucky number is 39, so let's<n>swim across the pool
and back<n>thirty-nine times!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I beg of you... Enough with your lucky<n>number...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
What a strange—perhaps even<n>fateful—encounter... Does<n>
Matikanefukukitaru really have what<n>it takes to prove
herself at tryouts?
